spring.controller

Class RESTAbstractController<R extends RESTAbstractModel<M>,M extends EditableObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • spring.controller.RESTAbstractController<R,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - A subclass of RESTAbstractModel
    M - The model that corresponds to the RESTModel of type R
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RESTCompanyController, RESTContractController, RESTFleetController, RESTFunctionController, RESTInvoiceController, RESTRoleController, RESTSpecialConditionController, RESTSuretyController, RESTUserController, RESTVehicleController, RESTVehicleTypeController

    public abstract class RESTAbstractController<R extends RESTAbstractModel<M>,M extends EditableObject>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements basic GET/{id}, POST, PUT/{id} and DELETE/{id} requests. Note that there is no generic implementation for GET. Basic means that it translates the RESTModel R to the domain specific model M and that it calls the appropriate method of the controller corresponding with the Model M. Authentication and exception handling is also implemented in the methods. There is no generic implementation for GET all requests because these requests have filters.
